Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard continues to the north and south from here.
Room.LongDescription: The long stretch of road runs east of the Oceancrest Central Arena, the entrance to which is located just to the north. The intersection with Overland Drive is located to the south, and the Khelleva Stables are to the east. You can see the many beautiful riding horses the Khelleva Stables train. Although most of the horses belong to the Khelleva Family, some are available for trade or purchase.
